nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.customization
Interface CustomizedFileServiceLocal

All Superinterfaces:
CustomizedFileService, Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomizedFileServiceImpl
public interface CustomizedFileServiceLocal
extends CustomizedFileService

Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

Method Summary

          Returns true if the logged user can manage system customized files.

notifyNewVersion

void notifyNewVersion(SystemAlert.Alerts alertType,
                      CustomizedFile customizedFile)
Notifies the new version of the customized file by creating/sending a system alert.

Parameters:
alertType - can logically be one of:
  • SystemAlert.Alerts.NEW_VERSION_OF_APPLICATION_PAGE
  • SystemAlert.Alerts.NEW_VERSION_OF_HELP_FILE
  • SystemAlert.Alerts.NEW_VERSION_OF_STATIC_FILE
However, the method doesn't check this.
customizedFile -
